review_blob: This is not to be toyed with. Supposedly its 7.2%? Im not quite calling bullshit on that but I reckon the hops are hallucinogenic or otherwise adding to the alcohol buzz. One time I sunk a whole lot of this I ended up waist deep in the Pacific Ocean off New Brighton. No idea how I got there. One nasty wave and I could have drowned. Had to walk all the way back to Linwood too. No cab will take you when you smell like fish. Then there was that other time I found myself shirtless in the forest having scrawled indecipherable runes on myself in felt tip pen, carrying a sack of pine cones. That was an awful yet deeply spiritual experience. Anyway kids, drink responsibly.

This is evil poison but the size and shape of the cans make it perfect fodder for wizard sticks.

HOW TO PLAY WIZARD STICKS:

* Get a box of NZ Lager or something else that comes in the big cans.

* When you finish a can attach it to the bottom of the new one with gaffer tape.

* When there are no beers left, fashion helmets out of the boxes.

* Shove each other a bit and exchange insults until either party says I DECLARE WIZARD STICKS.

* Go down the park and have a big sword fight with the cans you have taped together.

* Get into a massive argument with your girlfriend.

* Dont be too upset because your mate has passed out and its therefore not too embarrassing.

* Realise that bitchy flatmate has been listening the whole time.

* Pray to whatever gods you believe in to strike you down.
Somewhat reminiscent of receiving a golden shower from a dying cart horse. But its cheap and if you can tolerate a couple of trays of it, will get you hammered.

One of the worst beers in the known universe. Id actually rather be waterboarded with the hated Tasman Bitter in a disease infested secret prison cell rather than consume this muck. If you ever go around to somebodys house and they have this inexcusable product in the fridge, shun them.
